description:
Discover two new side-stories in Beacon Town and unlock some new shops along the way! Melanie is in a design slump and needs some inspiration, while Doc is having trouble in the romance department. Can you help them both out?

DLC pack contains:

• Side-Story: Melanie's New Designs
• Reward: Seasonal outfits for the main and marriable characters - 42 new outfits in all!
• Side-Story: Doc's Romance Help
• Reward: Ability to customise your house with seven unique interiors!
name: Special Side-Stories
